query: SELECT  *,  FIELD(LOWER(A.TYPE), 'tiflash', 'tikv', 'pd', 'tidb') AS _ORDER FROM (  SELECT   TYPE, INSTANCE, DEVICE_TYPE, DEVICE_NAME, JSON_OBJECTAGG(NAME, VALUE) AS JSON_VALUE  FROM   INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CLUSTER_LOAD  WHERE   DEVICE_TYPE IN (?,?)  GROUP BY TYPE, INSTANCE, DEVICE_TYPE, DEVICE_NAME ) AS A ORDER BY  _ORDER DESC, INSTANCE, DEVICE_TYPE, DEVICE_NAME [arguments: ("memory", "cpu")];
